Address.label: Address
Address.value: AVENIDA LOS INDUSTRIALES,CARRERA 48 NO. 26-85, MEDELLIN, Colombia

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BanColombia SA is a financial services company. A conglomerate of financial institutions, BanColombia offers a wide range of product offerings and financial services, including loans to small and midsize enterprises and governments, leasing, factoring, and asset management. The company's operations are in Colombia, Peru, Panama, Costa Rica, El Salvador, Puerto Rico, and Guatemala.
